title: aNivAi annaipOl
sahitya:
aNaivAi annaipOl ArumukhanE ennai nI


anupallavi

  tuNaiyAi irundOr tollaiyum endanai anugAmal undan aruLai aLLit-tandu


caraNam    taNikat-talam tEDi tanjam enrunai nADi paNivEn panmuraiyuDan pAdAra vindam adanai
paNiyum enniDam parivODun uLLam kaninden kavalaigaL anaittum aghanrODa
